column2: Our tributary [Root.GetName] has decided to end their tributary relationship with us. We did not agree with this decision.
Peasants in [Root.GetName] have risen up, deciding they want to create a new independent "nation". What a load of hogwash.
Our vassal [Root.GetName] has decided to seek independence. This will be bad for their health.
More peasants, this time in [Root.GetName] have risen up, hoping for independence. What a terrible idea.
